channel.description: Skaffold watches for code changes in a repo and builds, tests, and deployes and application in Kubernetes What questions are they asking? Headline melding. How can I validate the structure of a container image? How do you run tests on a new version of your application and automate the creation of a new container? Set up an automation that watches source code for changes. If there are changes, then you will have a set of step ready to go that deploy to a K8s cluster, VMs, or your chosen Cloud provider.
